0: Jennifer Aniston has exclusively revealed to HELLO! magazine that she has no plans to marry or have children any time soon. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR There is, says the actress most firmly, no truth to the latest spate of rumours. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "Rumour number one," she says, ticking off points on her fingers, "I am not planning to get married any time soon. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "This ring that I'm wearing is not an engagement ring. I've been married once and I don't know if I'll get married again, but I can tell you that as of this very moment, as of today, I have no plans to get married. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "And rumour number two, no, we're not pregnant. It's just I quit smoking, so I’ve gained a couple of pounds. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "So – not pregnant and not getting married any time in the near future that I'm aware of. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "You see? All it takes to get the truth is to ask me!"
